slots.name: category
slots.label: Category
slots.description: Add a categorical column to group by (e.g., Issue Type, Alert Status). The measure will be aggregated per category, and only the first category will be displayed.

slots.name: measure
slots.label: Measure
slots.description: Add a measure to aggregate per category (e.g., COUNT, SUM). The aggregated value will be displayed as the main KPI number.

slots.name: order
slots.label: Order/Severity (Optional)
slots.description: Add a numeric column (e.g., _ORDER or _SEVERITY) to control color assignment. 0=Healthy (Green), 1=Warning (Yellow), 2=Error (Red), etc. If omitted, uses first color.

slots.name: legend
slots.label: Title (Optional)
slots.description: Add any column to use its name as the widget title. The column NAME will be displayed (not its values). If omitted, title is hidden.
